categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Bandin Dobah's asteroid base was an asteroid located in the Pit, an area of stray asteroids scattered throughout the arm of a nebula and located at the end of the Kessel Run. It served as Bandin Dobah's base in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It was composed of a hangar and three caves dug by space slugs: one with Godon Netakka's starship, another full of mynocks, and the last with the Vagrant, Dobah's freighter and holdout.
